input_email_body:
Subject: Inquiries About Payment Methods for McAfee Total Protection 2021

Hello support team, I am keen on acquiring a McAfee Total Protection 2021 plan and would appreciate your guidance on the payment alternatives available My name is Fatima Al-Farsi.. Specifically, could you clarify if your services accept credit cards, PayPal, or other forms of payment? Furthermore, are there any special deals or promotions for new customers? I eagerly await your response and assistance in completing my subscription. Many thanks for your time and support. You can reach me at elena.ivanova@support.org.
